content: skill level beginner size one size adult - woman materials needed 1 10 oz 482 yards skein aran weight #4 red heart super saver ombre yarn color true blue crochet hook size i/5 50 mm - yarn needle used for working in loose yarn ends stitches used foundation single_crochet - fsc half_double_crochet in the back loop only - hdcblo single_crochet - single_crochet gauge in this particular project gauge is not as important as some since it is not a fitted garment i crochet pretty loosely if you crochet tighter you may want to adjust to a larger hook to get your desired size finished size unstretched 84 inches long x 5 1/2 inches wide notes this stitch pattern is made using any number of chains i used 225 foundation single crochets but you can do a regular chain after the foundation single_crochet row all half_double_crochet stitches for each row are done in the back loop only hdcblo by using the back loop only you will form the lovely ribbed look of the scarf
